title: Step Jms Writer
content:
Reference to JMS Server Resource inruntime configuration.

JMS properties specific for Message Broker are specified there, e.g. Connection Factory class name,
			JNDIContextFactoryInitial, JNDIProviderURL.

Format of the message is configured by an expression template. Supports JMS message properties. Optional output passes processed records.Scorermay be configured to mark possible message transfer errors.

It is necessary to copy proper JMS MQ implementation JAR to DQC classpath, e.g.[DQC_HOME]\runtime\lib\
